LanguageData.VBE_DrankEarlGreyTea.label: drank earl grey tea
LanguageData.VBE_DrankEarlGreyTea.description: Tannins naturally found in tea once metabolised increases the stimuli in ones nervous system, suppressing ones urge to sleep, as well as boosting ones immune system. Increases immunity gain speed by 15% and provides 10% reduction in rest fall rate for 5 hours. Earl grey tea provides a 10% research speed bonus.
